title: Mega Man VI
content:
Mega Man 6 was released by Capcom in 1993. It is the least popular of the NES Mega Man titles because by this point in time the SNES was dominating the market.

Dr Wily is probably up to his old tricks again here. I don't know. I was busy playing Mega Man X.
boss_weaknessses:
Boss Weaknesses

Robot Masters

  • Wind Man: Use Centaur Flash or Mega-Buster
  • Flame Man: Use Wind Storm
  • Blizzard Man: Use Flame Blast
  • Plant Man: Use Blizzard Attack
  • Tomahawk Man: Use Plant Barrier
  • Yamato Man: Use Silver Tomahawk
  • Knight Man: Use Yamato Spear
  • Centaur Man: Use Knight Crush

Mr. X Fortress Guardians

  • Rounder II: Use Flame Blast
  • Power Piston: Use Silver Tomahawk
  • Metonger Z: Use Blizzard Attack
  • X Crusher: Use Flame Blast

Wily Fortress Guardians

  • Mechazaurus: Use Yamato Spear
  • Tank CS2: Use Wind Storm
  • Wily Phase 1: Use Silver Tomahawk
  • Wily Phase 2: Use Knight Crush or Silver Tomahawk
  • Wily Phase 3: Use Beat or Mega-Buster
